flagged_additives.name: INS 319 (Sodium Cyclamate)
flagged_additives.reason: Banned in some countries linked to bladder cancer and kidney damage in animal studies

flagged_additives.name: E621 (MSG)
flagged_additives.reason: Risk of headaches and potential toxicity concerns in sensitive individuals

healthy_alternative: Switch to a product with natural sweeteners or no added sugars
pro_tip: Avoid MSG and artificial sweeteners (INS) for better health outcomes

flagged_additives.name: Glucoono Delta Lactone (INS 575)
flagged_additives.reason: INS 575 is a prebiotic additive, but may cause gastrointestinal discomfort in sensitive individuals.

preference_alerts: Milk Solids (contains lactose, a natural sugar). User preference for 'No Sugar' may be violated depending on interpretation.
healthy_alternative: Switch to a lactose-free plant-based milk alternative.
pro_tip: Check for lactose content if sensitive to dairy sugars.

flagged_additives.reason: Neurotoxic at high doses; causes headaches and sensitivity in susceptible individuals

flagged_additives.name: Palm Oil
flagged_additives.reason: High in saturated fats (44-50% of total oil), contributing to cardiovascular risk

preference_alerts: Sugar (direct violation of no sugar preference)
healthy_alternative: Natural nut butter with minimal ingredients (e.g., blended peanuts and coconut oil)
pro_tip: Avoid maltodextrin from non-organic sources and preservatives like E621; opt for whole-food savory snacks instead.

flagged_additives.name: INS 319 (Soy lecithin)
flagged_additives.reason: Common emulsifier linked to soy allergies and potential hormone disruption

flagged_additives.name: E621 (Monosodium glutamate)
flagged_additives.reason: May cause headaches and sensitivity in some individuals; banned in some countries for children's products

healthy_alternative: Cook homemade chocolate oat balls with dark chocolate (70%+), oats, nut butter, and cinnamon
pro_tip: Palm oil and synthetic additives like E621 suggest a highly processed snack despite the 'oats' claim. Opt for whole-food snacks with fewer than 5 ingredients.
